CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 反对；违背…；禁止；与…竞争；对…造成伤害；碰；倚着；紧靠；逆向；以…为背景；与…相比；防备；抵御；讨厌；不赞同

word_group.brief_definition: 打击, 斗争, 抗击
反对；抵抗；与（一种情绪；原则）相反；对…不利的
警告；告诫；告诫（某人）提防...
进行斗争；和...作斗争；对抗
努力反对；努力抵制；竭力反对

bilingual.source: Why are some people against space exploration?
bilingual.target: 为什么有些人反对太空探索？

bilingual.source: They are also starting a campaign against your company.
bilingual.target: 他们也在发起反对你们公司的运动。

bilingual.source: More people are against finning and wish to protect sharks.
bilingual.target: 更多人反对割鳍并希望保护鲨鱼。

bilingual.source: He organized large peaceful protests against the South African government.
bilingual.target: 他组织了大规模的和平抗议，反对南非政府。

bilingual.source: These children organized a real-life campaign against nuclear power stations.
bilingual.target: 这些孩子组织了一场反对核电站的真实活动。

bilingual.source: He durst not speak against the king.
Many people are against the new law.
bilingual.target: 许多人反对这项新法律。

bilingual.source: Are you pro or against the new law?
bilingual.target: 你赞成还是反对这项新法律？

list.abstract: against，英语单词，介词，意为“反对，违反；对……不利；紧靠，倚，碰撞；针对；预防，抵御；（体育比赛）对阵；以……为背景；参照，和……相比；（赌博）预计……的失败”。

yingyinNormal.en: Rise up against the bloody Red Queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 起来反对血腥的红皇后。

yingyinNormal.en: I was strongly against that decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时强烈反对那个决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. The United States voted against this resolution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，美国投了反对票。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you're against abortion, so my guess is you're repul...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你反对堕胎，所以我猜你……

yingyinNormal.en: What do you have against breaking the rules, Ranger Rick?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么反对打破规则，游骑兵里克？

yingyinNormal.en: Even your own Vice Regent is against this war. This tactics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使是您的副摄政也反对这场战争，这种战略。

yingyinNormal.en: America is leading the effort to rally the world against Russian aggression in Ukraine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国正在团结并领导着世界，反对俄罗斯侵略乌克兰。

yingyinNormal.en: But I wouldn't help him. So he conspired against me and he voted me out of my own company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我不愿意帮他，所以他密谋反对我，投票把我赶出了我的公司。

yingyinNormal.en: The rebellion against Gul'dan is gaining strength. With their help we can destroy this gate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对古尔丹的叛乱正在发展壮大，有了他们的帮助，我们可以摧毁这个门。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, I can. But when a champion steps forth to slay the Jabberwocky, the people will rise against her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，我能想象到，但是，当有位勇士出来杀死了炸脖龙，人们就会起来反对她。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we don't discriminate here. If people vote against our merger, I'm sure it'll be for other reasons than your disorder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们这里不搞歧视，如果有人投票反对合并，我确定是有其他原因而不是你的障碍。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Don't be mad at me. I mean, I can't vote against him. Even when he's being crazy? Well, what other times are there?!
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？别生我的气。我不能投他的反对票呀。哪怕他是个疯子吗？难道他有不疯的时候吗？！

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe we should call her. I would strongly advice against doing that. Just let me take care of it from my end, and avoid the complication.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我们应该给她打个电话。我坚决反对这么做，让我自己来处理吧，别搞得太复杂了。

yingyinNormal.en: President Underwood is being reckless with FEMA. You come out against me and America Works and you steal Dunbar's thunder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安德伍德总统在联邦应急管理局恣意妄为，你出面反对我和美国就业法案，然后抢了邓巴的风头。

yingyinNormal.en: I haven't been affiliated with the IRA for 30 years. When I was, I fought hard against the violence. I went to prison for what I did and paid my debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有30年没跟他们联系了。当年，我全力反对暴力活动。后来，我为自己的行为负责，蹲了监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you dare use science against me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你休想用科学对付我。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually it's your word against yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实呢，我都录下来了。

yingyinNormal.en: But they have not yet moved against us. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他们还没有向我们进攻，没有。

yingyinNormal.en: You've declared war against the Federation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你已经向星际联邦宣战。

yingyinNormal.en: No one can stand against the darkness alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有人能独自抵挡黑暗。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 反对; 违反; 相反

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 进行斗争；和...作斗争；对抗
努力反对；努力抵制；竭力反对

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 反对; 违反; 相反

examination_example.sentence: Forests give us shade, quiet and one of the harder challenges in the fight <highlight>against</highlight> climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 森林给了我们阴凉、宁静，也是应对气候变化的最严峻挑战之一。

examination_example.sentence: Enraged by Entergy's behavior, the Vermont Senate voted 26 to 4 last year <highlight>against</highlight> allowing an extension.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佛蒙特州参议院对恩特基的行为感到愤怒，去年以26票赞成对4票反对允许延期。

examination_example.sentence: In Wisconsin the unions have rallied thousands of supporters <highlight>against</highlight> Scott Walker, the hardline Republican governor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在威斯康星州，工会已召集数千名支持者反对强硬的共和党州长Scott Walker。

examination_example.sentence: They are biased <highlight>against</highlight> car manufacturers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对汽车制造商有偏见。

examination_example.sentence: Reveals a strong prejudice <highlight>against</highlight> urban areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 揭示了对城市地区的强烈偏见。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers, employers, and health professionals have been shown to harbor biases <highlight>against</highlight> the obese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师、雇主和卫生专业人员都表现出对肥胖者的偏见。

examination_example.sentence: That's likely because the rural poor are using the money as makeshift insurance policies <highlight>against</highlight> inclement weather, Ferraro says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 费拉罗说，这可能是因为农村贫困人口将这笔钱用作应对恶劣天气的临时保单。

examination_example.sentence: It protects <highlight>against</highlight> unfair competition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它防止不公平竞争。

examination_example.sentence: No longer that you can insure yourself <highlight>against</highlight> the risk of unemployment and receive unconditional payments if the disaster happens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你再也不能为自己投保失业险，并在灾难发生时获得无条件付款。

examination_example.sentence: Man will finally win the race <highlight>against</highlight> machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类将最终赢得与机器的竞争。

examination_example.sentence: We need to reframe race <highlight>against</highlight> the machine as race with the machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要重构关系，把“人机对抗”变成“人机同跑”。

examination_example.sentence: This was an average guy, up <highlight>against</highlight> the best trained, best equipped, fiercest, most brutal enemies seen in centuries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个普通人，面对的是几个世纪以来最训练有素、装备最好、最凶猛、最残暴的敌人。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>against</highlight> that background that the information commissioner, Elizabeth Denham, has issued her damning verdict <highlight>against</highlight> the Royal Free hospital trust under the NHS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种背景下，信息专员伊丽莎白 德哈姆对公立医疗系统旗下的皇家免费医院进行指控。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Against</highlight> a backdrop of drastic changes in economy and population structure, younger Americans are drawing a new 21st-century road map to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济和人口结构急剧变化的背景下，年轻的美国人正在绘制新的21世纪成功路线图。

examination_example.sentence: He favours out-of-town shopping sites <highlight>against</highlight> high streets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起商业大街他更喜欢郊区的购物场所。

sense_info_list.en: close to, touching or hitting sb/sth

word_usage.usage: against用在fight、strive、struggle等词后，同with意思相同，不过against更强调一种困难中的反抗。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 警告；告诫；告诫(某人)提防...

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Guard <highlight>against</highlight> their harm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 防范他们的伤害。

sense_info_list.en: in or into contact with; in a direction opposite to

examination_example.sentence: At first, the web seemed to push <highlight>against</highlight> this trend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，万维网似乎与这一趋势背道而驰。

word_usage.usage: against用在fight，strive，struggle等词后面，同with意思相同，表“与...对立; 反对”。against侧重指一种困难中的反抗。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 反对; 违反; 相反

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 反对; 违反; 相反

examination_example.sentence: Suniya Luthar, a psychologist, is <highlight>against</highlight> paying kids for chores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 心理学家Suniya Luthar反对为孩子做家务付钱。

examination_example.sentence: The main argument <highlight>against</highlight> graffiti is that it spoils the appearance of both types of property: public and private.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反对涂鸦的主要论点是，它破坏了公共和私人两种财产的外观。

examination_example.sentence: The arguments <highlight>against</highlight> physical education have included concerns that gym time may be taking away from study time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反对体育教育的理由包括担心健身时间可能会占用学习时间。

examination_example.sentence: When parents engage in play with their children, it builds a wall <highlight>against</highlight> the harmful effects of all kinds of stress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母与孩子玩耍时，能为孩子筑起一道屏障来抵御各种压力的有害影响。

examination_example.sentence: And the best defense <highlight>against</highlight> memory loss is to try to prevent it by building up your brain's cognitive (认知的) reserve, Daffner says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达夫纳说，防止记忆丧失的最好办法是通过建立大脑的认知储备来预防。

examination_example.sentence: Save <highlight>against</highlight> a rainy day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未雨绸缪。

examination_example.sentence: Many of them feel prejudiced <highlight>against</highlight> socially and culturally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的许多人对社会和文化怀有偏见。

examination_example.sentence: Punish teachers discriminating <highlight>against</highlight> left-handed students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 惩罚歧视左撇子学生的老师。

examination_example.sentence: There is discrimination <highlight>against</highlight> male nurses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男护士受到歧视。

sense_info_list.en: close to, touching or hitting sb./sth.

examination_example.sentence: I remember the harsh acid smell of the cleaning solution and the scraping sound of stiff iron brushes <highlight>against</highlight> rough brick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还记得清洁剂强烈的酸味和坚硬的铁刷在粗糙的砖块上摩擦的声音。

examination_example.sentence: When you think you are lost, lean <highlight>against</highlight> a tree, and bring your mind to a point where it's under control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你觉得自己迷惘的时候，靠着一棵树，把你的思想带到一个你可以控制的点上。

examination_example.sentence: We compete <highlight>against</highlight> market transitions (过渡) , not competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们竞争的对手是市场转型，而不是竞争对手。

examination_example.sentence: They could fly <highlight>against</highlight> a strong wind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以顶着强风飞行。

word_usage.usage: against用在fight，strive，struggle等词后面，同with意思相同，表“与...对立; 反对”。against侧重指一种困难中的反抗。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 反对; 对抗; 反抗

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 进行斗争；和...作斗争；对抗
背叛；转而反对；变成和...敌对

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 反对; 对抗; 反抗

examination_example.sentence: Less discrimination <highlight>against</highlight> women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 减少对女性的歧视。

examination_example.sentence: You can make your environment work for you instead of <highlight>against</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以让环境对你有利，而不是不利。

examination_example.sentence: It struck me that playing <highlight>against</highlight> the other team was a great learning moment for all the girls on the team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我突然意识到，对队里所有的女孩来说，与另一个队比赛是一个很好的学习机会。

examination_example.sentence: This led to some painful experiences on Saturday as they played <highlight>against</highlight> teams better trained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这导致了他们在周六与训练有素的球队比赛时的一些痛苦经历。

examination_example.sentence: I came across a small clearing and immediately noticed the dead yellow grasses set <highlight>against</highlight> the fresh snow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我遇到了一块小空地，我立刻注意到枯黄的草地映衬着新雪。

examination_example.sentence: The tractor was resting <highlight>against</highlight> the crash barrier in the central reservation, having miraculously crossed the busy road with fast-flowing traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拖拉机正靠在中央保护区的防撞护栏上，奇迹般地穿过了车流湍急的繁忙道路。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 反对; 违反; 相反

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 反对；抵抗；与…相反；对…不利的
警告；告诫；告诫（某人）提防...

sense_info_list.zh: 反对; 违反; 相反

examination_example.sentence: In 1935, he returned to China and helped fight <highlight>against</highlight> the Japanese army.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1935年，他回到中国，帮助抗击日军。

examination_example.sentence: They have spent 16 years fighting <highlight>against</highlight> the desert.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们花了十六年时间和沙漠作斗争。

examination_example.sentence: I don't think it is right to use photocopied materials even in the classroom because it's <highlight>against</highlight> the law.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，即使是在课堂上，使用影印材料也是不对的，因为这是违法的。

examination_example.sentence: With increased skills and experience, the people learnt how to make the boats stronger <highlight>against</highlight> rains and storms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着技能和经验的增加，人们学会了如何使船只更坚固，以抵御风雨。

examination_example.sentence: Government in Quebec, Canada, stopped people selling the plant to businesses in order to protect the plant <highlight>against</highlight> being over-dug.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加拿大魁北克省政府禁止人们向企业出售该植物，以保护该植物不被过度挖掘。

examination_example.sentence: People are holding many different events to fight <highlight>against</highlight> diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们举办许多不同的活动来与疾病作斗争。

examination_example.sentence: People race <highlight>against</highlight> horses across the hills and mountains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们越过山丘，与马赛跑。

examination_example.sentence: A few months ago I was nominated for Governor of the great state of New York, to run <highlight>against</highlight> Stewart and John.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个月前，我被提名为纽约州州长，与斯图尔特和约翰竞选。

examination_example.sentence: I heard you had a soccer match <highlight>against</highlight> Class 4 yesterday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说你昨天和四班进行了一场足球赛。

examination_example.sentence: He kept silent to the charges <highlight>against</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对针对他的指控保持沉默。

examination_example.sentence: I really felt dirty to run <highlight>against</highlight> them for all their shameful crimes that were reported on newspapers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同他们竞选我感到很不光彩，因为报纸报道了他们所有可耻的罪行。

examination_example.sentence: "I have had a most serious accusation (投诉) made <highlight>against</highlight> you by Mrs. Bond."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我收到了邦德太太对你提出的最严重指控。”

sense_info_list.en: close to, touching or hitting sb/sth

examination_example.sentence: When going to sleep, they have to attach themselves, so they don't float (漂浮) around or hit their bodies <highlight>against</highlight> something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 睡觉时，它们必须附着在一起，这样它们就不会四处漂浮或撞到什么东西上。

examination_example.sentence: Ben was helping his mother when the rain began to beat heavily <highlight>against</highlight> the windows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当雨开始猛烈地敲打窗户时，本正在帮助他的母亲。

examination_example.sentence: There she was, sitting <highlight>against</highlight> a tree near the post office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她就在那儿，靠着邮局附近的一棵树坐着。

sense_info_list.en: with something in the background, as a contrast

examination_example.sentence: The scene of the Five Starred Red Flag <highlight>against</highlight> the dark sky on the grey lunar surface was taken by a camera.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在灰色的月球表面上，五星红旗映衬着黑暗的天空，这一场景被照相机拍摄下来了。

word_usage.usage: against用在fight，strive，struggle等词后面，同with意思相同，表“与...对立; 反对”。against侧重指一种困难中的反抗。
